column4: Got a problem with WINE, I install it, seems okay. I run "winecfg", It begin to create a directory, but then, nothing happens !!!
I had same problem i think - Just delete the ~/.wine dir. and run again.
=> still It works a little better ! thanks ! gonna try several things !
- No probs. You might wanna try removing and then updating too (if you haven't already :P) :)
